Description: Fragment of limestone bearing three columns of Hieroglyphic text cut in sunk relief; traces of green painted detail. Part of text describing transport of colossal statue.
Curator's comments: Published: W. V. Davies 'Djehutyhotep's Colossus Inscription and Major Brown's Photograph' in W. V. Davies (ed), Studies in Egyptian Antiquities: A Tribute to T. G. H. James (BM Occasional Paper 123, 1999), 29-35.
